name: PersistentSwitch
description:
Description:

Persistent Switch is a small game developed in one week for a university project that should have persistence as its main mechanic. PersistentSwitch is inspired by the story of the game that nobody has played: KillSwitch.

Three characters, three lives, three chances, death is permanent, once they are all dead, it is over. Can you save at least one character from certain death?

Whatever you do, the dead must be respected, please do not destroy their graves.

Credits:

Pixel-Art: 

https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-swamp-game-tileset-pixel-art/ by Craftpix

Music: Shipwrecked - Blood (Monolith 1997)

Programming: All the programming is done by me
